item.title: Commentary on Top 60-120 Liberal Arts Colleges
item.description: Introduction to Top 60-120 Liberal Arts Colleges # If the student population at the school has decreased in recent years (check the data), then it will be easier to apply for scholarships because they need your presence to polish their reputation. (After all, you are a good token.) The pressure depends on your language proficiency and academic ability. If you have a near-native language level and all A’s, then there is no pressure.
